channel.title: Is server offline?
channel.description: is the server offline or am i banned or something because it says connection refused: connect

item.title: Is server offline?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:8, topic:410409”][quote author=zuppers link=topic=511694.msg3713215#msg3713215 date=1313463154]

[quote author=xx matty xx link=topic=511694.msg3713195#msg3713195 date=1313462544]

[quote author=zuppers link=topic=511694.msg3713187#msg3713187 date=1313462170]
The server is offline for maintenance.
[/quote]You know you guys could have just asked me what the exploit was instead of raging and banning me, I never even said I was going to do anything. Oh well…
[/quote]I had nothing to do with that and didn’t know you were even banned till today.
[/quote]Sorry I know you had nothing to do with it, I was just responding to the staff in general because you’re the only one to comment on it.[/quote]
You were banned?!?11?

Wait… i didnt know any of this happening…

Read full topic

item.title: Is server offline?
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

Edges_surf:

thanks viz, and are u banned matt? is it set to expire?

um, I’m supposed to be banned for telling tom that I knew of an exploit in mopars server and some stuff I did about 2 years ago. I know it’s not mopars style to communicate, so I’ll be banned again as soon as he sees me and eventually everyone is going to work out the gaping hole in his security.

agl, I’m not a twat so I’m not going to tell people how to do it, but all the passwords to moparisthebest/moparscape/moparcraft can be accessed in plaintext.

Read full topic
